verses.verse: Shiggaion <WH7692> of David <WH1732>, which he sang <WH7891> <WH8804> unto the YY <WH3068>, concerning the words <WH1697> of Cush <WH3568> the Benjamite <WH1121> <WH1145>. O YY <WH3068> my 'Elohim <WH430>, in thee do I put my trust <WH2620> <WH8804>: save <WH3467> <WH8685> me from all them that persecute <WH7291> <WH8802> me, and deliver <WH5337> <WH8685> me:
Lest he tear <WH2963> <WH8799> my soul <WH5315> like a lion <WH738>, rending it in pieces <WH6561> <WH8802>, while there is none to deliver <WH5337> <WH8688>.
O YY <WH3068> my 'Elohim <WH430>, if I have done <WH6213> <WH8804> this; if there be <WH3426> iniquity <WH5766> in my hands <WH3709>;

If I have rewarded <WH1580> <WH8804> evil <WH7451> unto him that was at peace <WH7999> <WH8802> with me; (yea, I have delivered <WH2502> <WH8762> him that without cause <WH7387> is mine enemy <WH6887> <WH8802>:)

Let the enemy <WH341> <WH8802> persecute <WH7291> <WH8762> my soul <WH5315>, and take <WH5381> <WH8686> it; yea, let him tread down <WH7429> <WH8799> my life <WH2416> upon the earth <WH776>, and lay <WH7931> <WH8686> mine honour <WH3519> in the dust <WH6083>. Selah <WH5542>.

Arise <WH6965> <WH8798>, O YY <WH3068>, in thine anger <WH639>, lift up <WH5375> <WH8734> thyself because of the rage <WH5678> of mine enemies <WH6887> <WH8802>: and awake <WH5782> <WH8798> for me to the judgment <WH4941> that thou hast commanded <WH6680> <WH8765>.
So shall the congregation <WH5712> of the people <WH3816> compass thee about <WH5437> <WH8779>: for their sakes therefore return <WH7725> <WH8798> thou on high <WH4791>.

The YY <WH3068> shall judge <WH1777> <WH8799> the people <WH5971>: judge <WH8199> <WH8798> me, O YY <WH3068>, according to my righteousness <WH6664>, and according to mine integrity <WH8537> that is in me.

Oh let the wickedness <WH7451> of the wicked <WH7563> come to an end <WH1584> <WH8799>; but establish <WH3559> <WH8787> the just <WH6662>: for the righteous <WH6662> 'Elohim <WH430> trieth <WH974> <WH8802> the hearts <WH3826> and reins <WH3629>.
My defence <WH4043> is of 'Elohim <WH430>, which saveth <WH3467> <WH8688> the upright <WH3477> in heart <WH3820>.
'Elohim <WH430> judgeth <WH8199> <WH8802> the righteous <WH6662>, and 'Elohim <WH410> is angry <WH2194> <WH8802> with the wicked every day <WH3117>.
If he turn <WH7725> <WH8799> not, he will whet <WH3913> <WH8799> his sword <WH2719>; he hath bent <WH1869> <WH8804> his bow <WH7198>, and made it ready <WH3559> <WH8787>.
He hath also prepared <WH3559> <WH8689> for him the instruments <WH3627> of death <WH4194>; he ordaineth <WH6466> <WH8799> his arrows <WH2671> against the persecutors <WH1814> <WH8801>.
Behold, he travaileth <WH2254> <WH8762> with iniquity <WH205>, and hath conceived <WH2029> <WH8804> mischief <WH5999>, and brought forth <WH3205> <WH8804> falsehood <WH8267>.
He made <WH3738> <WH8804> a pit <WH953>, and digged <WH2658> <WH8799> it, and is fallen <WH5307> <WH8799> into the ditch <WH7845> which he made <WH6466> <WH8799>.
His mischief <WH5999> shall return <WH7725> <WH8799> upon his own head <WH7218>, and his violent <WH2555> dealing shall come down <WH3381> <WH8799> upon his own pate <WH6936>.
I will praise <WH3034> <WH8686> the YY <WH3068> according to his righteousness <WH6664>: and will sing praise <WH2167> <WH8762> to the name <WH8034> of the YY <WH3068> most high <WH5945>.
